## R Markdown



```{#2}
N <- 1000
minimums <- c()
mins <- rep(0, N)
for (i in 1:N){
  mins[i] <- min(rexp(n=1))
}
minimums[[1]] <- mins
```

```{#3}
firstProb <- sum(mins < 0.5) / N
```

```{#4}
results <- c()
results[i] <- firstProb

for (j in 2:50){
    for (i in 1:N) {
        mins[i]<-min(rexp(n=j))
    }
    results[j] <- sum(mins < 0.5) / N
    minimums[[j]] <- mins
}
```

```{#5}
plot(x = 1:50, y = results)
```

```{#6}
Commentary
```

```{#7}
plot(x = rep(1, N), y = minimums[[1]])
for (i in 3:50){
    point(x <- rep(i, N), y <- minimums[[i]])
}
```
